title: Benefits for you and your family
content:
In addition to the benefits outlined in this LGBTQ+ Guide, where eligible, Company A provides you and your family with all the standard comprehensive and flexible benefits designed to meet your needs in all stages of life, including, but not limited to, medical, dental, vision, life insurance, disability, paid time off, retirement savings plan (401(k)) and more.
Eligible dependents include:
Â· Your spouse or domestic partner (regardless of gender), including Civil Union Partners
. Your children until the end of the month in which they turn 26
As with all dependents, once enrolled, you'll be asked to verify your relationship. Depending on your relationship status, the Benefits Support Center will require a marriage license, affidavit of domestic partnership, income tax returns and/or birth certificates for your children.
If you have questions or want to learn more about the eligibility requirements, refer to the Company A Health and Welfare Plan Wrap Summary Plan Description (SPD) posted at www.BenefitsSupportCenter.com.
Refer to your online enrollment guide for details
This LGBTQ+ Benefits Guide is a supplement to your online enrollment guide. Please reference that document for additional information about your Company A benefits.
4
PRIDE: Your LGBTQ+ Benefits Guide
Comprehensive healthcare offerings, including transgender-inclusive, HIV and fertility services*
